name: keitaro-theme
description: The official WordPress theme of Keitaro Inc.

scripts.about:build: echo 'Adjust file operations commands (i.e. cp) based on the OS you are running. These commands are specific to Linux-based operating systems.'
scripts.build: cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/. assets/fonts/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js assets/js/ && sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map --style=compressed assets/scss/style.scss style.css

author: Goce Mitevski
